data.name: Business Recovery Loans
data.description: Loans for businesses impacted by COVID-19 under the Government's SME Recovery Loan Scheme.

features.additionalInfo: The SME Recovery Loan Scheme provides support to businesses impacted by COVID-19. The Federal Government has extended the scheme to continue to support  businesses until 30th June 2022
Loans can be used to invest, buy commercial property or to acquire another business. Eligible customers may be able to refinance existing business loans.
Variable interest rates options are available

You have the option to defer loan repayments for 6 or 12 months. You can request an extension to your repayment deferral, which we will reasonably consider, provided it doesn't extend the period beyond 24 months. Once you reach the end of your loan repayment deferral period, accrued interest and fees will be added to your loan facility and you'll be required to start making loan repayments.
Loan terms of  3, 5, 10 years are available
You can have partially and fully secured options.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Should have an annual turnover of less than $250 million
Should be trading for more than 12 months and have a valid ABN
Be a tax resident of Australia - that is based, registered and operating in Australia.
Businesses that are adversely economically affected by COVID-19.
